name: Trip to mystery
description: On this trip, you will travel to the past and will hear stories about Pacha Kamaq ('Earth-Maker'), who was considered the creator god by the people who lived in this part of Perú before the Inca conquest. You will know amazing things about this god, while watching the temples and sanctuaries where he was worshipped. You will also know about The Wari, a Middle Horizon civilization that flourished in the south-central Andes and coastal area of modern-day Perú, from about AD 500 to 1000. It will be like being back in those times and watching everything going on in front of you.
